moves.name: Moonblast
moves.effect: Has a chance (30%) of lowering the target’s Sp. Atk by 1 stat rank.

moves.name: Cotton Spore
moves.effect: Lowers the target’s Speed by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: Sugar Rush!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Sp. Atk by 1 stat rank. Raises the Speed of all allied sync pairs by 2 stat ranks. Applies the Free Move Next effect to the user.

syncMove.name: Semisweet Fairy Beam
syncMove.description: This move’s power increases when the target is paralyzed.

passives.name: Hunter’s Instinct
passives.description: The more the target’s Speed is lowered, the more it powers up the user’s moves.

passives.name: Ramming Speed
passives.description: The more the user’s Speed is raised, the more it powers up the user’s moves.

passives.name: Go Viral 9
passives.description: When the user’s status move is used and inflicted a status condition on an opponent, inflicts the same status condition on all opposing sync pairs.

grid.bonus: Stun Spore:Troublemaker 1- Raises the chance of success for status moves that inflict status conditions.
Stun Spore:Move Gauge Refresh 2- Has a chance (30%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Moonblast:Unhindered- When the user attacks, ignores damage-reducing effects on the target’s field of play.
Moonblast:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Cotton Spore:Move Gauge Refresh 2- Has a chance (30%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Sugar Rush!:MP Refresh 2- Has a chance (30%) of restoring one MP of the user’s move when that move is successful.
Sugar Rush!:Propulsion 2- Has a chance (30%) of reducing the user’s sync move countdown by one when the user’s move is successful.
Lithe- Prevents the user from getting paralyzed.
Dauntless- Sp. Atk cannot be lowered.
Antitoxin- Prevents the user from getting poisoned or badly poisoned.
Speeding Sun 3- Quickly charges the move gauge when the weather is sunny.
Solar Shield- The user is not affected by status conditions when the weather is sunny.
Paralysis Synergy 5- Powers up the user’s moves when the target is paralyzed.
Healing Sun 1- Restores the user’s HP whenever its Pokémon takes an action while the weather is sunny.
Speedy Entry 1- Raises the user’s Speed by 1 stat rank when it enters a battle.
Inertia- The more user’s Speed is raised, the more it powers up the user’s sync moves.
Overpower- The more the target’s Sp. Atk is lowered, the more it powers up the user’s moves.
